actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress in opposition to excessive violence in sports.

summary.text: Declares that Congress favors encouraging the professional sporting leagues to take the necessary steps to see that incidents of excessive violence during competition are eliminated.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress in opposition to excessive violence in sports.
